Today’s News
Trading Code: EXCH
News Title: DSE NEWS: Greetings Message

Honorable Investors, Good morning! Please make your investment decision based on Company fundamentals, technical analysis, price level and disclosed information. Avoid rumor-based speculations.


Trading Code: REGL
News Title: BSEC NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors

Investors are requested to consider the following facts at the time of making investment decision in the Capital Market: 1. Without acquiring proper knowledge, information and experience regarding different aspects and matters of Capital Market, one should not invest in the Capital Market. 2. The gain or loss, whichever comes from the investment, it belongs to you. So, well - thought of investment decision based on knowledge and fundamentals of the securities may be real assistance to you. (cont.)


Trading Code: REGL
News Title: BSEC NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors

(Continuation of BSEC News - Awareness Message for Investors) 3. Do not pay any heed to rumors at the time of trading shares; it may cause loss to you. Even spreading rumor is legally prohibited. (Ref.: SEC letter no. SEC/SRMIC/2010/726 dated November 23, 2010). (end)


Trading Code: EXCH
News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors

DSE does not publish market data through any social media pages. INVESTORS should not rely on any information from an unauthorized source such as Facebook, WhatsApp, Viber, Linkedin etc. (cont.)


Trading Code: EXCH
News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness Message for Investors

(Continuation of DSE News): If anyone spreads information based on rumor, using patent of DSE, he/she will be held liable under Copyright Act, 2000 and it shall be treated as punishable offence under Section-17 of the Securities and Exchange Ordinance, 1969. (end)


Trading Code: EXCH
News Title: DSE NEWS: Awareness message

DSENEWS: All Stock Dealers, Stock Brokers and Authorized Representatives are asked to strictly follow the code of conduct as enumerated in the Second Schedule to the Securities and Exchange Commission (Stock Dealer, Stock Broker and Authorized Representative) Rules, 2000.


Trading Code: EXCH
News Title: DSENEWS: Commencement of ES of Trust Islami Life Insurance Ltd. by EIs

The subscription for shares of Trust Islami Life Insurance Limited by the eligible investors through electronic subscription system of the stock exchanges under fixed price method will be started from 9.00 a.m. of April 3, 2023 and continued till 4:30 p.m. of April 9, 2023 (round the clock). Each Eligible Investor (EI) who intends to submit application through the Electronic Subscription System (ESS) of the exchange(s) shall maintain a minimum investment of BDT 1,50,00,000 (cont.1)


Trading Code: EXCH
News Title: DSENEWS: Commencement of ES of Trust Islami Life Insurance Ltd. by EIs

(Continuation of DSENEWS): (one crore fifty lakh only) for approved pension funds, recognized provident funds and approved gratuity funds and other Els of BDT 3,00,00,000 (three crore only) at market price in listed securities as on March 23, 2023 (day-end) as per Rule 2(1)(e) of the Bangladesh Securities and Exchange Commission (Public Issue) Rules, 2015; which is in accordance with the BSEC consent letter to Trust Islami Life Insurance Limited Ref: BSEC/CI/IPO-326/2021/1195 dated (cont.2)


Trading Code: EXCH
News Title: DSENEWS: Commencement of ES of Trust Islami Life Insurance Ltd. by EIs

(Continuation of DSENEWS): February 26, 2023.The Central Depository Bangladesh Limited (CDBL) shall send a report to the exchange regarding the holding of EIs in the matured listed securities and the exchange shall ensure the compliance in this regard. Participating EIs will be required to pay full subscription amount (100%) and subscription fee Tk. 3,000 (three thousand only) through Mercantile Bank Limited (A/C Name: Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited, (cont.3)


Trading Code: EXCH
News Title: DSENEWS: Commencement of ES of Trust Islami Life Insurance Ltd. by EIs

(Continuation of DSENEWS): A/C No.: 135413134079404) in from April 3, 2023 to April 9, 2023 (during banking hour). Please visit the following website for subscription related updates: https://www.essbangladesh.com. (end)


Trading Code: EXCH
News Title: DSENEWS: Commencement of ES of Trust Islami Life Insurance Ltd. by GP

The subscription for shares of Trust Islami Life Insurance Limited will be started from 9.00 a.m. of April 3, 2023 and continued till 4:30 p.m. of April 9, 2023 (round the clock). Minimum required investment for General Public (GP) will be BDT 50,000 (fifty thousand only) and for Non-resident Bangladeshi (NRB) will be BDT 100,000 (one lakh only) as on March 23, 2023 (day-end) in matured listed securities (cont.1)


Trading Code: EXCH
News Title: DSENEWS: Commencement of ES of Trust Islami Life Insurance Ltd. by GP

(Continuation of DSENEWS): at market price (between the close price of both Exchanges whichever is higher) which is in accordance with the BSEC consent letter to Trust Islami Life Insurance Limited Ref: BSEC/CI/IPO-326/2021/1195 dated February 26, 2023. Minimum and maximum amount allowed for subscription for General Public would be BDT 10,000 (ten thousand only). The registered TREC Holders/Merchant bankers have to upload the IPO application file of General Public (cont.2)


Trading Code: EXCH
News Title: DSENEWS: Commencement of ES of Trust Islami Life Insurance Ltd. by GP

(Continuation of DSENEWS): in the Electronic Subscription System (ESS) from 9:00 AM of April 10, 2023 to 4:30 PM of April 12, 2023 and make the full payment to DSE through Mercantile Bank Limited (A/C Name: Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited, A/C No.: 135413134079404) from April 10, 2023 to April 12, 2023 (during banking hour) from their consolidated customers' account based on total submitted application. (cont.3)


Trading Code: EXCH
News Title: DSENEWS: Commencement of ES of Trust Islami Life Insurance Ltd. by GP

(Continuation of DSENEWS): Exchanges shall send the list of BO accounts who have applied in the IPO to the CDBL and CDBL shall verify the list of BO accounts provided by the Exchanges regarding investment of general applicants in listed securities. Please visit the following website for subscription related updates: https://www.essbangladesh.com. (end)


Trading Code: UTTARABANK
News Title: UTTARABANK: Dividend Declaration

The Board of Directors has recommended 14% cash and 14% stock dividend for the year ended December 31, 2022. Date of AGM: 18.05.2023, Time: 11:00 AM; Venue: Digital Platform. Record Date: 26.04.2023. The Company has also reported Consolidated EPS of Tk. 4.20, Consolidated NAV per share of Tk. 31.79 and Consolidated NOCFPS of Tk. (14.32) for the year ended December 31, 2022 as against Tk. 3.45, Tk. 28.80 and Tk. (0.83) respectively for the year ended December 31, 2021. (cont.1)


Trading Code: UTTARABANK
News Title: UTTARABANK: Dividend Declaration

(Continuation news of UTTARABANK): Disclosures for recommendation of Stock Dividend: (a) Stock Dividend has been recommended to strengthen the capital base of the Company and to support business growth. (b) Stock Dividend has been declared out of accumulated profit. (cont.2)


Trading Code: UTTARABANK
News Title: UTTARABANK: Dividend Declaration

(Continuation news of UTTARABANK): (c) Stock Dividend has not been declared from capital reserve or revaluation reserve or any unrealized gain or out of profit earned prior to incorporation of the Company or through reducing paid up capital or through doing anything so that the post dividend retained earnings became negative or a debit balance. (end)


Trading Code: UTTARABANK
News Title: UTTARABANK: Price Limit Open

There will be no price limit on the trading of the shares of the Company today (04.04.2023) following its corporate declaration. However, the floor price shall be applicable accordingly.


Trading Code: MALEKSPIN
News Title: MALEKSPIN: Postponement of proposed project and replacement of machinery

Refer to their earlier news disseminated on 23.06.2021, regarding Proposal for BMRE of the existing project and installing a new plant, the company has further informed that the Board of Directors has decided to postpone the implementation of their proposed project at Bhaluka, Mymensingh. The Board of Directors also decided to replace some vital existing machinery at the existing mill at Shafipur, Kaliakoir, Gazipur having gone worn out and losing efficiency, (cont.)


Trading Code: MALEKSPIN
News Title: MALEKSPIN: Postponement of proposed project and replacement of machinery

(Continuation news of MALEKSPIN): at a total estimated investment of Tk. 106.64 crore be implemented by funds generated from internal sources and taking loan from Banks and other sources. (end)


Trading Code: PARAMOUNT
News Title: PARAMOUNT: Dividend Declaration

The Board of Directors has recommended 10% cash dividend for the year ended December 31, 2022. Date of AGM: 12.06.2023, Time: 11:00 AM, Venue: Digital Platform (Link: https://agmbd.live/paramount2023). Record Date: 03.05.2023. The Company has also reported EPS of Tk. 1.87, NAV per share of Tk. 25.81 and NOCFPS of Tk. 3.16 for the year ended December 31, 2022 as against Tk. 3.03, Tk. 25.25 and Tk. 4.20 respectively for the year ended December 31, 2021.


Trading Code: PARAMOUNT
News Title: PARAMOUNT: Price Limit Open

There will be no price limit on the trading of the shares of the Company today (04.04.2023) following its corporate declaration. However, the floor price shall be applicable accordingly.


Trading Code: GEMINISEA
News Title: GEMINISEA: Sale Confirmation of a Sponsor Director

Mrs. Ameenah Ahmed, one of the Sponsor Directors of the Company, has further informed that she has completed her sale of 1,00,000 shares of the Company at prevailing market price through Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited as per declaration disseminated on 29.03.2023.


Trading Code: PTL
News Title: PTL: Appointment of Directors

The company has informed that the Board of Directors has appointed Ms. Aparna Ghosh and Ms. Samsun Nahar Nadia as Directors in the Board of the company with immediate effect.


Trading Code: GEMINISEA
News Title: GEMINISEA: Sale Confirmation of a Sponsor

Kazi Shahid Ahmed, one of the Sponsors of the Company, has further informed that he has completed his sale of 1,22,000 shares of the Company at prevailing market price through Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited as per declaration disseminated on 29.03.2023.


Trading Code: DELTALIFE
News Title: DELTALIFE: Board Meeting schedule under LR 19(1)

As per Regulation 19(1) of the Dhaka Stock Exchange (Listing) Regulations, 2015, the Company has informed that a meeting of the Board of Directors will be held on April 11, 2023 at 3:00 PM to consider, among others, audited financial statements of the Company for the year ended December 31, 2019, 2020 and 2021. These adoptions are not in compliance with Regulation 18 and 19 of the Dhaka Stock Exchange (Listing) Regulations, 2015. (cont.)


Trading Code: DELTALIFE
News Title: DELTALIFE: Board Meeting schedule under LR 19(1)

(Continuation news of DELTALIFE): Note that, the company did not submit any quarterly statements (Q1, Q2 and Q3) for the year 2020, 2021 and 2022 which is non-compliance of Regulation 16 and 17 of the Dhaka Stock Exchange (Listing) Regulations, 2015. (end)


Trading Code: UNITEDINS
News Title: UNITEDINS: Spot News

Trading of the shares of the company will be allowed only in the Spot Market and Block transaction will also be settled as per spot settlement cycle with cum benefit from 05.04.2023 to 06.04.2023 and trading of the shares will remain suspended on record date i.e., 09.04.2023.


Trading Code: SKICL

Trading of the shares of the company will be allowed only in the Spot Market and Block transaction will also be settled as per spot settlement cycle with cum benefit from 05.04.2023 to 06.04.2023 and trading of the shares will remain suspended on record date i.e., 09.04.2023.

Trading Code: TB15Y0423
News Title: TB15Y0423: Suspension for Record date

Trading of 15Y BGTB 09/04/2023 Government Securities will remain suspended on record date i.e., 06.04.2023 and day before the record date i.e., 05.04.2023. The Government Securities will be delisted with effect from 09.04.2023 due to completion of maturity.


Trading Code: OIMEX
News Title: OIMEX: Category Change

The Company has been placed in 'B' category from existing 'A' category with effect from April 05, 2023 as the Company has approved 1% Cash dividend for General Shareholders other than Sponsors and Directors for the year ended June 30, 2022.


Trading Code: BXPHARMA
News Title: BXPHARMA: Sale and Buy Declarations of Directors

IFIC Securities Limited, one of the Corporate Directors of the Company, has expressed its intention to sell 40,00,000 shares (in the Block Market) whereas New Dacca Industries Limited, another Corporate Director of the company, has expressed its intention to buy 40,00,000 shares (in the Block Market) at prevailing market price through Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited within next 30 working days.

Chartered Accountants. The auditor's report was unmodified, and date of auditor's report was 15 March 2022. (cont.1)

Date of auditor's (cont.2)


Trading Code: ROBI
News Title: ROBI: Other Matter

(Continuation news of ROBI): report of the subsidiary is 13 February 2023. Our opinion, in so far as it relates to the amounts included in respect of the subsidiary, is based on the audited financial statements and auditor's report of the subsidiary. Another subsidiary of the Group is Smart Pay Limited which was incorporated on 3rd October 2022. The financial statements of the subsidiary company are audited by us." (end)

Announcement
  • The DSE Tower's newly constructed state-of-the-art data center has received the highly coveted Rated-3 (TIA-942 Standard) Certification, earning recognition on a global scale.
  • Information Memorandum of sub-ordinate Bond of IPDC
  • স্টক এক্সচেঞ্জে সরকারি সিকিউরিটিজ লেনদেনের মাধ্যমে একটি প্রানবন্ত বন্ড মার্কেট গড়ে তোলার লক্ষ্যে বাংলাদেশ ব্যাংক ও বাংলাদেশ সিকিউরিটিজ অ্যান্ড এক্সচেঞ্জ কমিশনের মধ্যে সমঝোতা স্মারক স্বাক্ষর
  • Admission is open for the 23rd batch (Summer 2023 semester) of Post Graduate Diploma in Capital Market (PGDCM) by BICM
  • BSEC's order on standard downward price change limit (Circuit breaker)
  • বিনা ফি’তে শেয়ার বাজারে সম্মানিত নারী বিনিয়োগকারীদের জন্য শিক্ষামূলক কার্যক্রম
  • Panel of Auditors for auditing Financial Statements of DSE TREC Holder Companies
  • Panel of Auditors' for auditing financial statements of listed securities
  • Contact us for Advertisement
  • "Considering the current cybersecurity situation and alert received from BGD e-GOV CIRT, DSE has decided to allow access of TWS and DSE-Mobile App to the Trading system from 8:00 am to 8:00 pm on trading day only. The measures has been taken for the greater interest of the Exchange, investors and Nation as a whole. We shall normalized the access of the users to the Trading system once the situation is improved."
  • Guidance on Sustainability Reporting
  • "শেয়ারবাজারে বিনিয়োগ ঝুঁকিপূর্ণ, জেনে ও বুঝে বিনিয়োগ করুন। ফেসবুক কিংবা অন্য কোন সমর্থিত সূত্র থেকে সংগৃহীত তথ্যের ভিত্তিতে বিনিয়োগ করা থেকে বিরত থাকুন।"
